settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.footnote: ** Only valid for orders of £100 or more through uk.hyperx.com. To access this offer, you must have added products to your online basket with a total value of £100 or more on uk.hyperx.com. At checkout, a £20 discount will be applied automatically to your total order value. This offer starts on 21/08/2024 at 00.00 GMT and will expire on 31/09/2024 at 23.59 GMT. Available whilst stocks last. Requires acceptance of Terms and conditions of Sales and Service. Purchases made using this offer must be for personal use and not for resale. Offer is non-exchangeable, non-transferable and no cash alternative is offered, except as required by law. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any coupon code. HP reserves the right, acting reasonably and in accordance with all relevant legislation and codes of practice to change or cancel this offer at any time.
